text: Mɨŋgɨya simbi mɨŋgɨya simbindu mɨnza hɨvɨyɨ taya, Got Israel Hatiŋ Mitahi Aviŋgɨyɨmu Aru Hɨvɨ haŋandɨhinɨrɨm indarɨramarasɨmu. Kandɨhamatɨrasɨmu hɨvɨyɨ gavamandu aru miku hama kru ñamba vana andɨhu tamandu upɨyɨndu mɨnzavat mɨŋgaŋ ndaya tɨhɨmitarasɨmi. Krunavundi nurɨŋambi, kru ñamba vana andɨhu tamandu upɨ hañɨndu mɨnzavat hamandu ñɨmbi yɨhɨrasɨmu. Kamatɨhu kru kandɨhamaŋ tɨhɨmitahi nurɨ kɨnduyɨ urasɨmi.
